body_html: More generally, would it be possible (or worth it) making the cpp module extensions (when loaded in Python) inherit from nn.Module? Or would that require that nn.Module is moved entirely to Python?
body_text: More generally, would it be possible (or worth it) making the cpp module extensions (when loaded in Python) inherit from nn.Module? Or would that require that nn.Module is moved entirely to Python?
body: More generally, would it be possible (or worth it) making the cpp module extensions (when loaded in Python) inherit from `nn.Module`? Or would that require that `nn.Module` is moved entirely to Python?
